description: Returns information about the configured contact methods. Specify a protocol in your request to return information about a specific contact method. A contact method is used to send you notifications about your Amazon Lightsail resources. You can add one email address and one mobile phone number contact method in each Amazon Web Services Region. However, SMS text messaging is not supported in some Amazon Web Services Regions, and SMS text messages cannot be sent to some countries/regions. For more information, see Notifications in Amazon Lightsail.

nested_items.name: contactMethods
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the contact methods.

nested_items.name: contactEndpoint
nested_items.description: The destination of the contact method, such as an email address or a mobile phone number.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the contact method.
PendingVerification - The contact method has not yet been verified, and the verification has not yet expired.
Valid - The contact method has been verified.
InValid - An attempt was made to verify the contact method, but the verification has expired.

nested_items.name: protocol
nested_items.description: The protocol of the contact method, such as email or SMS (text messaging).

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the contact method.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the contact method.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the contact method was created.

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The Lightsail resource type of the contact method.

nested_items.name: supportCode
nested_items.description: The support code. Include this code in your email to support when you have questions about your Lightsail contact method. This code enables our support team to look up your Lightsail information more easily.
